resources.string:
Instructions 


1. Check internet connectivity


2. Ensure GPS is on


3. Enter “1111” in the Unique No. Field


4. Enter the phone number registered with your Transport Desk, i.e., the number in which you receive your transport related notifications/SMSs


5. Click “Submit”


6. Note the OTP that you receive


7. Key in the OTP and click “Submit”


8. Welcome screen with Trip Time and Trip Date


9. Cab (car icon) and your location (blue dot) on map.Click on the cab icon to see who are the people travelling in the cab and also who have already boarded


10. Swipe right or click navigation icon for “Trip Details”, “About”, “Help”, "Emergency Contact", "Manage Booking", "Feedback", "My Cab"


11. To access driver or escort’s phone number, swipe right from home screen, and click on “Trip Details”. Driver and Escort’s numbers appear as links that can be clicked to dial.
